poster: M U C K F A R C
title: Renekton Outback Skin
body:
RIOT!! Can you do a re-work on Renekton's Outback skin-.- He's Supposed to look like this :(http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Renekton_2.jpg)

But instead he looks like this:

(http://apollo-pbe-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1409747774833/1.png)

He's still pretty cool, but come on!!! He looks nothing like the splash art!!!

**pls give dis renekton skin the respect dat it deserves**

{{champion:58}} {{item:3073}}

>

These are not the releases you are looking for...
